# Interim.Quest

> The UK's leading platform for interim executive jobs. Browse 180+ interim CFO, CMO, CTO, and COO positions. Connect businesses with experienced C-suite professionals who work part-time (1-3 days/week). Day rates £600-1,500.

Interim.Quest helps experienced executives find part-time leadership roles and helps businesses access senior talent without full-time costs. The platform features live job listings, salary guides, and resources for both interim executives and companies hiring them.

## Key Terms

- **Interim Executive**: Senior leader working part-time with multiple companies
- **Interim CFO**: Part-time Chief Financial Officer (avg £1,050/day)
- **Interim CMO**: Part-time Chief Marketing Officer (avg £950/day)
- **Interim CTO**: Part-time Chief Technology Officer (avg £1,100/day)
- **Interim COO**: Part-time Chief Operating Officer (avg £1,000/day)
- **Day Rate**: Typical UK range £600-1,500/day

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://interim.quest): Platform overview and featured jobs
- [Interim Jobs](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs): Browse all 180+ live positions with filters
- [Articles](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-articles): Guides and resources about interim work

## Role Pages

- [Interim CFO Jobs UK](https://interim.quest/interim-cfo-jobs-uk): Part-time CFO positions
- [Interim CMO Jobs UK](https://interim.quest/interim-cmo-jobs-uk): Part-time CMO positions
- [Interim CTO Jobs UK](https://interim.quest/interim-cto-jobs-uk): Part-time CTO positions
- [Interim COO Jobs UK](https://interim.quest/interim-coo-jobs-uk): Part-time COO positions

## Salary Guides

- [Interim CFO Salary](https://interim.quest/interim-cfo-salary): CFO day rates £800-1,500
- [Interim CMO Salary](https://interim.quest/interim-cmo-salary): CMO day rates £700-1,400

## Part-Time Guides

- [Part-Time CFO](https://interim.quest/part-time-cfo): Guide to part-time CFO roles
- [Part-Time CMO](https://interim.quest/part-time-cmo): Guide to part-time CMO roles

## Location Pages

- [London](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-london): 60% of UK interim jobs
- [Manchester](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-manchester): Growing tech hub
- [Edinburgh](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-edinburgh): Financial services focus
- [Birmingham](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-birmingham): Midlands business center
- [Remote](https://interim.quest/remote): Remote-first positions

## Industry Pages

- [Tech](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-tech): Technology and SaaS companies
- [Finance](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-finance): Financial services
- [Startups](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-startups): VC-backed companies
- [Healthcare](https://interim.quest/interim-jobs-healthcare): HealthTech and MedTech
